div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 108px; height: 1px; padding-top: 105px; margin-left: 7px;

div.div: 1. Invoke the contract that implements the XIBC application interface on the source chainÂ

div.div: 3. Relayer syncs the root of trust and cross-chain packet commitment proof from the source chain to the destination chain

div.div: 5. Relayer syncs the root of trust and cross-chain packet commitment proof from the Teleport chain to the destination chain

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 475px; margin-left: 897px;

div.div: 6. Destination chain XIBC contracts verify the trust root and the cross-chain packet commitment proof, then execute the cross-chain package and generate ackÂ

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 138px; height: 1px; padding-top: 535px; margin-left: 634px;

div.div: 7. Relayer syncs the root of trust and ack commitment proof from the destinationÂ chain to the Teleport chain

div.div: 9. Relayer syncs the root of trust and ack commitment proof from the Teleport chain to the source chain

div.div: 10. Source chain XIBC contracts verify the trust root and the ack commitment proof, then excute the ack

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 305px; margin-left: 537px;

div.div: 4. Teleport chain XIBC contracts verify the trust root and the cross-chain packet commitment proof, then store the packetÂ
